item.title: Convert avif images to png
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: I happened to want to save an image from a website with avif format (android 12 technology), but then not be able to view it with default image reader. So I created a Nautilus script to convert it to png   The only dependency you need is Davif which you can download here:   […]

item.title: Video conversion MB output size
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hi, I found a very handy script to convert videos and choose the final weight in MB, useful for example to reduce and insert movies in social media. The original script is used from terminal, while I modified it and it integrates with the Nautilus file manager on Gnu/Linux distros based on Gnome The script […]

item.title: Convert HEIC iphone mac photos to JPG with Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hi, I ran into a friend of mine who has iphone with the problem of opening with Ubuntu his photos which however are in HEIC format. I found an easy solution: open a terminal and type in sudo apt-get install libheif-examples give enter and type in your password to install this dependency, After that create […]

item.title: Ubuntu Bluetooth phone calls Android as handsfree
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello, everyone, I was able to hear and make calls from the mobile phone connected in BT (bluetooth) through the computer with Ubuntu and with headphones with microphone connected to the PC. Let’s say how modern cars that have the Bluetooth handsfree, in fact you can make calls without headphones inserted. 0) Connect and pair […]

item.title: Install Lightworks 15 on Ubuntu 17.10
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hi, the Lightworks video editing program on the official website has two versions: 14 and 15, now on ubuntu 17.10 for the 14 there are tricks to do to make it work and find various guides googolando, while instead the version 15 is designed for ubuntu 18.04 and 18.10. Trying alone I found this solution […]

item.title: Rename PDF based on the title tag data
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello, after several attempts I present a new script for Nautilus (file manager present in most linux distributions): allows you to rename all the PDF files, within the same folder, according to the internal tag of the title (for instance right click, property, document, title); very useful in various cases !!! first of all download […]

item.title: Ubuntu 17.10 will make the Gnome interface look like old Unity
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello everyone, after a few days of testing I managed to make the new interface Gnome of Ubuntu 17.10 similar to the old call Unity it’s very simple we’ll use the extensions that the Gnome community offers: 1) install the bases for managing extensions: sudo apt-get install gnome-tweak-tool chrome-gnome-shell dconf-editor 2) Aprire firefox e installare […]

item.title: View mp4 videos in ubuntu 17.10 gnome+nvidia
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello everyone, after several searches on the web I did not find a working solution to see the video mp4 with H.264 encoding on Video (default program Video, internal name Totem). The MPEG-4 AAC sound was heard but the video was not displayed! In fact, if you open a terminal and write totem namevideo.mp4 we […]

item.title: FireTray minimize thunderbird in the gnome panel

item.description: # # Last modified November 16, 2012 # # Hello from time FireTray use to keep active in the bar thunderbird gnome so I signal the presence of new email! item.title: Compress pdf script with Nautilus
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: After doing a search on the net I found that pdf file compression is quite dark! To make life easier I created a script Nautilus (tested on version 10.04 and 11.04 of ubuntu 64bit, but working with all of them) The script compresses the pdf looking for in the can to maintain good visual quality.
